info.name: LocalPro API - Provider Role
info.description: Complete API collection for Service Provider users. Includes service management, booking management, ads, analytics, finance, and provider-specific features.

body.raw:
{
  "firstName": "Jane",
  "lastName": "Provider",
  "businessName": "Jane's Premium Services",
  "bio": "Professional service provider with 5 years experience",
  "skills": ["cleaning", "plumbing", "electrical"],
  "certifications": ["Licensed Plumber", "Safety Certified"],
  "serviceAreas": ["Manila", "Quezon City"],
  "hourlyRate": 500
}

{
  "title": "Experienced Cleaner Needed",
  "description": "Looking for an experienced cleaner to join our team",
  "category": "cleaning",
  "type": "full-time",
  "location": "Manila",
  "salary": {
    "min": 15000,
    "max": 25000,
    "currency": "PHP",
    "period": "monthly"
  },
  "requirements": ["2+ years experience", "Own cleaning equipment"],
  "benefits": ["Health insurance", "Paid leave"],
  "applicationDeadline": "2024-12-31"
}
